coverages.coverage_name: Trip cancellation and loss of deposit

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)
With 'Cancel for any reason' add-on (Claim for reason not covered by base)

limits.type: Overall limit for family plan (50% reimbursement)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip cancelled within 30 days before departure due to specified events (e.g., serious injury/illness/death of insured/companion/family, witness duty, home damage, serious public event, onward flight cancellation by airline due to specific reasons, hijack >12hrs). Covers unused, non-refundable costs and cancellation fees.
Excludes claims if policy bought <72 hours before departure (unless due to accidental death). Excludes amounts refundable from other sources (cash, vouchers, credits etc.). Excludes upgrades.
For 'Cancel for any reason' add-on: Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit. Reimburses 50% of costs up to the limit for cancellation reasons not covered by the base policy.

For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers cancellation due to pre-existing condition subject to 50% co-payment and specific limits. Exclusions apply (e.g., cover bought <72hrs before departure, terminal illness).
General exclusion applies for events known before booking/policy purchase.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)
With 'Cancel for any reason' add-on (Claim for reason not covered by base)

limits.type: Overall limit for family plan (50% reimbursement)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip postponed within 30 days before departure due to specified events (e.g., serious injury/illness/death of insured/companion/family, witness duty, home damage, serious public event). Covers rebooking fees to reorganise trip within 180 days.
Excludes claims if policy bought <72 hours before departure (unless due to accidental death). Excludes amounts refundable from other sources. Excludes upgrades.
For 'Cancel for any reason' add-on: Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit. Reimburses 50% of costs up to the limit for postponement reasons not covered by the base policy.
For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers postponement due to pre-existing condition subject to 50% co-payment and specific limits. Exclusions apply.
General exclusion applies for events known before booking/policy purchase.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)
With 'Cancel for any reason' add-on (Claim for reason not covered by base)

limits.type: Overall limit for family plan (50% reimbursement)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if you return early to Singapore due to specified events overseas (e.g., serious injury/illness of insured/companion confirmed overseas, death of insured/companion/family, witness duty, home damage, serious public event, hijack >12hrs). Covers additional admin/transport/accom costs for immediate return.

Excludes cost of unused original return ticket. Excludes additional expenses if no return ticket originally purchased. Excludes costs for buses, taxis, ride-hailing. Excludes amounts refundable from other sources. Excludes upgrades.

For 'Cancel for any reason' add-on: Must be purchased within 7 days of initial trip deposit. Trip must have commenced for >= 48 hours. Reimburses 50% of costs up to the limit for cutting short for reasons not covered by the base policy. Excludes extra costs not in original itinerary.
For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers cutting short due to pre-existing condition subject to 50% co-payment and specific limits. Exclusions apply.

Pays if trip cancelled before departure or disrupted during trip because a travel agent, transport provider, tour operator, or accommodation provider becomes insolvent. Covers non-refundable prepaid costs and additional transport/accom expenses.
Definition of insolvency provided (unable to pay debts, ceased operations due to declared insolvency or owner absconding/fraud).
Excludes claims if policy bought <72 hours before departure. Excludes amounts refundable from other sources.

base_limits.basis: S$100 for every six hours diverted while overseas

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays S$100 for every 6 continuous hours you are diverted to another destination while travelling on an airplane, before reaching scheduled destination.
Requires written proof of diversion from provider/agent showing hours and reason.

base_limits.basis: S$100 for every six hours delay while overseas
S$100 for the first six hours delay in Singapore only

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if scheduled public transport is delayed or overbooked for 6 continuous hours or more. Pays S$100 per 6 hours overseas (max S$500). Pays S$100 for first 6 hours delay in Singapore only.
Must have checked in on time. Requires written proof of delay from provider/agent showing hours and reason.
Excludes delay caused by you, your family member or travel companion.

base_limits.basis: S$100 for every six hours you are stranded

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays S$100 for every 6 continuous hours stranded if you miss a connection because incoming scheduled public transport arrives late, and no alternative travel is available within 6 hours.
Must have checked in on time for original transport. Requires written proof of delay/missed connection from provider/agent.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if trip disrupted (in Singapore or overseas) forcing itinerary change due to: serious injury/illness making you unfit to travel (confirmed by doctor), serious public event, flight cancelled by airline due to airport/runway/airspace closure or poor weather. Covers additional transport/accom to continue trip OR unused non-refundable transport/accom costs.
Excludes expenses to extend trip longer than originally scheduled. Excludes amounts refundable from other sources. Excludes upgrades.
For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers disruption due to pre-existing condition subject to 50% co-payment and specific limits. Exclusions apply.
Benefits provided by the policy are payable for claims resulting directly from an act of terrorism during the trip, subject to the limits and conditions for each benefit.
Act of terrorism defined as an act (including force/violence) by person/group for political, religious, ideological purposes to influence government or put public in fear.

base_limits.basis: S$150 for every six hours of delay
S$150 for first six hour delay in Singapore only

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if your checked-in baggage is delayed, misdirected, or misplaced by public transport provider for 6 continuous hours or more after arrival. Pays S$150 per 6 hours (max S$600). Pays S$150 for first 6 hours delay on final return to Singapore.
Requires written proof from provider/agent stating name, date, time, duration, and reason for delay. Paid per claim, not per bag. Only one person paid if multiple share bag.

coverages.coverage_name: Theft of or damage to baggage or personal belongings

base_limits.type: Sub-limit for all other items (per item)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if baggage/personal belongings stolen or accidentally damaged during trip, or lost by airline operator. Payment based on depreciation (age vs purchase price) or current market value (max S$50 per item, max 5 items without proof). FWD decides repair/replace/cash. Damaged item may become FWD property.

Conditions: Mobile phones, laptops, tablets, jewellery must be carried by you (not checked-in or left unattended). Items must be under your care or authorised person's care. Report theft to police/authority within 24 hours.
Exclusions: Perishables, consumables, vehicles, cards, musical instruments, business goods, sports equipment, stored data, unexplained loss, wear & tear.
Benefit reduced by any amount paid under Baggage Delay for the same items.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss of passport, travel documents & theft of money

base_limits.type: Sub-limit for theft of your money

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays for replacement costs of lost passport/travel documents overseas, and value of stolen cash/travellers' cheques (up to S$300).

Conditions: Call Emergency Assistance (+65 6322 2072) for advice. Items must be under care/locked. Money must be stolen while carried by you (not checked-in or left unattended). Report loss/theft to police/authority within 24 hours.
Reimburses unauthorised charges made on your credit card while overseas.
Conditions: Report charges/theft to card issuer and police within 24 hours of discovery. Follow card issuer's rules for unauthorised charges/lost cards.
Exclusions: Charges made by family member, travel companion, or person entrusted with card details.
Covers the excess or deductible you become legally liable to pay due to accidental loss or damage to a rental car from a licensed operator. This is included in the base cover for Business plan.

Conditions: You were named driver/co-driver, legally allowed to drive overseas, driving at time of incident, followed rental agreement rules and local laws. Rental car must be collected overseas. Requires copy of agreement, receipts for excess paid, related reports.
Only one claim paid per insured rental car under this or any other policy.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers moving you to appropriate medical facility (overseas or Singapore) or returning you to Singapore for treatment if you suffer a life-threatening illness/injury overseas. Also covers repatriation of mortal remains. MUST call Emergency Assistance (+65 6322 2072). FWD decides transport method.
Pays for transport (air/surface ambulance, regular transport etc.), admin fees for changing tickets, reasonable mortician/undertaker costs (embalmment, cremation, basic casket/urn).
For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers evacuation/repatriation due to pre-existing condition up to S$100,000 limit. Exclusions apply.

coverages.coverage_name: Personal liability while on your trip

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays if you are held legally responsible for accidental death or bodily injury to another person, or loss/damage to another person's property, while overseas. Other person must not be an interested party.
Covers damages awarded by court (excl punitive) and agreed legal costs/expenses.
Conditions: Do not admit liability or negotiate payment without FWD permission. FWD may take over defence. Must agree costs before engaging own lawyer.

Exclusions: Criminal acts, property in your care/custody, owning/using firearms, animals, motorised vehicles, watercraft, aircraft (incl drones), remote controlled devices, bicycles, business activities.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays lump sum if you suffer an accident during trip causing death or total permanent disability within 90 days. Payment based on percentage scale for specific injuries (e.g., loss of limb/sight, burns). Max 100% of sum insured per person.
Total and permanent disability defined as unable to work in any job/business for 6 months due to accident and unlikely ever to do so.
Disappearance clause: If on public transport that disappears/wrecked/sinks and body not found after 1 year, considered deceased.
General exclusion for suicide/self-inflicted acts applies.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan
Sub-limit for dental expenses caused by accident

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Claim due to pre-existing condition)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Reimburses medically necessary treatment costs for unexpected illness or injury suffered overseas. Covers treatment for up to 30 days from first treatment date.

Includes: Dental treatment for injury caused by accident (up to S$5,000), ambulance, specialist (if referred by GP), mobility aids (crutches, wheelchairs etc., up to S$500, excl prosthesis), medical equipment for recovery.
Exclusions: Dental treatment due to non-accident tooth/gum/oral disease or wear; non-natural teeth (dentures, implants etc.); treatment by interested party; planned/pre-arranged treatment.

For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Covers overseas medical expenses due to pre-existing condition up to S$100,000 limit. Exclusions apply (e.g., specific dental, Chinese med, planned treatment).

base_limits.basis: Capped at S$200 per day (S$400 per day in intensive care)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays a daily cash benefit for every continuous 24-hour period confined to an overseas hospital due to unexpected illness/injury suffered overseas. Admission must be medically necessary.
Daily amount is doubled if hospitalised in intensive care unit (ICU), up to S$400 per day.

conditional_limits.condition: With 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on (Extension due to pre-existing condition)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Policy cover automatically extended free of charge if return to Singapore delayed by serious public event OR if confined to hospital overseas on advice of medical practitioner.
For 'Pre-existing medical conditions' add-on: Extension up to 30 days if delayed due to hospitalisation or being medically unfit to travel due to the pre-existing condition.

Reimburses costs of phone calls made while overseas to: FWD Emergency Assistance hotline, police, medical facilities, consulates, or family members in Singapore for assistance/support due to serious illness/injury.

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard room accom) for one adult family member to travel to be with you if you are confined to hospital overseas for at least 5 continuous days due to unexpected illness/injury, confirmed unable to return to SG, and have no adult family member with you.
Benefit stops after 30 days from first confinement or when medically fit to travel/return.
If you die while hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) is paid (whichever is highest).

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard room accom) for one adult family member to travel to look after your child(ren) if you are confined to hospital overseas for at least 5 continuous days due to unexpected illness/injury, confirmed unable to return to SG, travelling with child(ren), and are the only adult.
Benefit stops after 30 days from first confinement or when medically fit to travel/return.
If you die while hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) is paid (whichever is highest).

Reimburses reasonable costs (return economy transport, standard room accom) for one adult family member to travel to arrange return of your body if you die overseas from unexpected illness/injury and no other adult family member is on the trip.
If you die while hospitalised, only one benefit (Hospitalisation Visit, Child Companion, or Compassionate Travel) is paid (whichever is highest).

coverages.coverage_name: Chinese medicine practitioner, physiotherapist and chiropractor expenses

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays for treatment from Chinese medicine practitioner, physiotherapist, or chiropractor overseas or within 48 hours of returning to Singapore, due to unexpected illness/injury suffered overseas. Capped at S$50 per visit.
Conditions: Must have received medical treatment overseas for the same illness/injury OR seek this treatment within 48 hours of returning to Singapore.
Excludes treatment received from an interested party.
Excluded under the optional Pre-existing medical conditions cover.

base_limits.type: Child covered under a family plan
Sub-limit for dental expenses caused by accident

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Reimburses medically necessary treatment costs in Singapore after returning, for unexpected illness or injury suffered overseas. Covers treatment for up to 30 days from date of return.
Conditions: Must have received medical treatment overseas for the same illness/injury OR seek medical treatment in Singapore within 48 hours of returning.

Includes: Dental treatment for injury caused by accident (up to S$5,000), ambulance, specialist (if referred by GP), mobility aids (crutches, wheelchairs etc., up to S$500, excl prosthesis), medical equipment for recovery.
Exclusions: Dental treatment due to non-accident tooth/gum/oral disease or wear; non-natural teeth (dentures, implants etc.); treatment by interested party.

coverages.coverage_name: Daily hospital cash while in Singapore

base_limits.basis: Capped at S$100 per day (S$200 per day in intensive care)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays a daily cash benefit for every continuous 24-hour period confined to a hospital in Singapore due to unexpected illness/injury suffered overseas. Admission must be medically necessary.
Conditions: Hospital confinement must start within 48 hours of return OR within 30 days after return if medical treatment was sought overseas during the trip.
Daily amount is doubled if hospitalised in intensive care unit (ICU), up to S$200 per day.

Optional add-on providing coverage for specified benefits when the claim arises directly from a pre-existing medical condition of insured, travelling family member, or travel companion (if also covered).
Pre-existing condition defined as one aware of (or reasonably expected to be aware of) before trip, or received advice/tests/treatment/diagnosis/drugs for in 12 months before trip.
50% co-payment applies to Trip Cancellation, Postponement, Cut Short, and Disruption benefits under this cover.

Exclusions: Claims if cover bought <72hrs before departure, specific costs (upgrades, unused tickets etc.), claims from airline fault, non-direct claims, known illness if cover not bought for affected person, terminal illness diagnosis (<12mths), specific medical exclusions (dental, Chinese med, planned treatment).
Optional add-on providing 50% reimbursement (up to limits) for Trip Cancellation, Postponement, or Cut Short for reasons not covered under the standard policy sections.
Condition: Must purchase this cover within 7 days from making the initial trip deposit.
Condition for Trip Cut Short: Trip must have commenced for 48 hours or more.
Exclusions: Refunded amounts, upgrades, extra costs not in original itinerary (for cut short). Policy ends if cancellation/postponement paid.

limits.basis: S$50 for every six hours of delay

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Optional add-on. Pays S$50 for every 6 continuous hours your scheduled public transport back to Singapore is delayed, if your pet is staying in a pet hotel or kennel during your trip.
Condition: Delay must be >= 6 hours and not caused by you, your family member, or travel companion.

Optional add-on. Covers theft or accidental damage to your sports equipment during trip, or loss/theft while in custody of airline/transport/accom provider. Also covers cost of renting replacement equipment (max S$100/day).
Sports equipment defined as: golf clubs, diving gear, skis/poles, snowboards, wakeboards, bicycles, fishing tackle, specialist apparel for diving/skiing/snowboarding.
Payment for damaged/stolen equipment based on depreciation table (age vs purchase price).
Conditions: Equipment must be under care/locked. Report theft to police/authority within 24 hours.
Exclusion: Damage that happens while equipment is in use (practice or play).
Optional add-on. Covers loss or damage to your home contents due to fire or burglary occurring at your home while you are overseas on your trip.
Home contents defined as household furniture/furnishing, domestic electronic appliances, personal belongings owned by you and in your home. Excludes cash and travellers' cheques.
Payment based on depreciation table (age vs purchase price).
